problem:
A line is parameterized by
\[\begin{pmatrix} x \\ y \end{pmatrix} = \begin{pmatrix} 4 \\ 2 \end{pmatrix} + t \begin{pmatrix} 20 \\ -10 \end{pmatrix}.\]A second line is parameterized by
\[\begin{pmatrix} x \\ y \end{pmatrix} = \begin{pmatrix} 1 \\ 4 \end{pmatrix} + u \begin{pmatrix} a \\ -25 \end{pmatrix}.\]If the two lines do not intersect, then find $a.$
